name: Eiroa - Jamastran - 50 x 5
additionalNotes: With hopes of producing yet another heavy hitter, Christian chose to honor the Jamastran Valley, the most famous growing region in Honduras, with the addition of Eiroa Jamastran. Packaged in a triangular box that can open two ways, Eiroa Jamastran is a gorgeous Honduran puro that proudly showcases all the great attributes of the tobacco and soil that makes that region so popular. Notes of earth, pecan, citrus come together in a sweet and savory medium to full-bodied experience that will have you feeling as if you are right there in Honduras.
